summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Acquisition and Development Opportunity Fund category of the Neighborhood Parks, Green Spaces, Trails, and Zoo Levy; accepting the recommendations of the Parks and Green Spaces Levy Oversight Committee; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to proceed with certain of those capital programs; amending the 2005-2010 Capital Improvement Program; amending the Capital Facilities Element of the City's Comprehensive Plan; and amending the 2005 Adopted Budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation by making appropriations from the 2000 Parks Levy Fund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
